title: The Right Tool

rules.text: Choose a Ranger. That Ranger may discard one of their equipped gear to search their Ranger deck for a gear and equip it without paying its energy cost.

flavor_text: Your mother taught you how to work with a great number of tools, and from her you gained an intimate knowledge of their function and practical application.

rules.text: Reduce the equip value of your gear by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
AWA + [reason] (use 1 pocket): Open your belt pouch and reach inside to search your Ranger deck for a gear and add it to your hand.

title: The Mother of Invention

rules.text: Choose an attachment in a Ranger's discard. That Ranger may immediately play that attachment as if it were in their hand.

flavor_text: You know that inspiration does not simply come when called. When it strikes, you must act.

title: Moment of Desperation

rules.text: Discard one of your equipped gear to add harm to a being equal to the number of tokens on the discarded gear.

flavor_text: You'll never forget the look on your brother's face when he saw that raccoon out of the corner of his eye, believing it was a bearsloth. You also remember the raccoon, struck by a belt pouch, yet unperturbed.

title: Masterwork

rules.text: Attach to a Ranger's equipped gear.
Response: When a Ranger performs a test from the attached gear, commit 1 effort.

flavor_text: During your apprenticeship at the carbon forge, you learned much from Elder Orlin.

rules.text: Attach to a Ranger's equipped tech.
When you play this attachment, add 3 tokens to the attached gear.
Response: When this card becomes unattached, discard 3 tokens from the attached gear.

title: Functional Replica

rules.text: Exhaust (use 1 charge): Choose a Ranger's equipped gear. Resolve the chosen gear's effect as if you had used a token from it and/or exhausted it.

flavor_text: So you would discover the artistry in even the simplest of objects, your mentor encouraged you to mimic the work of master craftspeople.

title: Favorite Gear

rules.text: Attach to one of your equipped gear.
Response: After you use a token from the attached gear, soothe 1 fatigue.

flavor_text: When you are at work, you are at peace, and when you work with your favorite gear, you are filled with a deep sense of purpose, fully in the moment and alive.

title: Energized Hiking Greaves

rules.text: Use X buffers: When you perform a test, suffer X fewer fatigue from each card between you and the card with which you are interacting.

flavor_text: You crafted these hiking greaves from dollowood bark, overlaid them with a veneer of forged carbon, then applied a kinesthetic lining as the finishing touch.
